title: Britain faces warnings of a tech exodus over tax plans ahead of high-stakes budget
content: Technology bosses and investors warn the U.K. could face an exodus of entrepreneurs if the government hikes capital gains tax — a levy on investment profits.
summary: Technology bosses and investors warn the U.K. could face an exodus of entrepreneurs if the government hikes capital gains tax — a levy on investment profits.

title: Russia and Europe tussle for Moldova, as just over 50% vote 'yes' on future EU membership
content: Moldova's political destiny is hanging in the balance Monday after key votes on whether to embrace a future with Europe, or to remain within Russia's orbit.
summary: Moldova's political destiny is hanging in the balance Monday after key votes on whether to embrace a future with Europe, or to remain within Russia's orbit.

title: Robinhood rolls out high-risk margin trading in the UK after getting regulator nod
content: Robinhood said Monday that it's rolling out margin investing — or the ability for investors to borrow cash to augment their trades — in the U.K.
summary: Robinhood said Monday that it's rolling out margin investing — or the ability for investors to borrow cash to augment their trades — in the U.K.

title: Iran aided Russia against Ukraine. Now it needs to call in the favor
content: Iran could do with assistance from its powerful ally, Russia. The extent to which Moscow can — and will — help is uncertain, however.
summary: Iran could do with assistance from its powerful ally, Russia. The extent to which Moscow can — and will — help is uncertain, however.

title: China tightens export controls for tech and goods with military use, ahead of Xi's trip to Russia
content: China unveiled a set of regulations on export control of goods and technologies that could be used for military purposes.
summary: China unveiled a set of regulations on export control of goods and technologies that could be used for military purposes.

title: China cuts benchmark lending rates by 25 basis points
content: The move was expected. China's central bank governor indicated last week that the loan prime rates would be lowered.
summary: The move was expected. China's central bank governor indicated last week that the loan prime rates would be lowered.

title: ‘They want something different’: Two reports predict a big shift in travel behavior in 2025
content: Trend reports from Expedia and Booking.com show vacationers are forgoing splashy trips to global hot spots in favor of lesser-known places.
summary: Trend reports from Expedia and Booking.com show vacationers are forgoing splashy trips to global hot spots in favor of lesser-known places.

title: How Liberty Media became one of the world's most valuable sports empires
content: As global lockdowns began in 2020, sports fans surged online and Liberty Media had a chance to realize Chairman John Malone's vision.
summary: As global lockdowns began in 2020, sports fans surged online and Liberty Media had a chance to realize Chairman John Malone's vision.

title: Three in four Europeans support the use of AI by police and military, study says
content: Most Europeans support the use of AI technologies like facial recognition by the police and military for surveillance, a report from IE University found.
summary: Most Europeans support the use of AI technologies like facial recognition by the police and military for surveillance, a report from IE University found.

title: Boeing machinists to vote on new proposal with 35% raises that could end strike
content: The IAM will vote Wednesday on the new proposal which includes 35% wage increases over four years, a higher signing bonus of $7,000 and more.
summary: The IAM will vote Wednesday on the new proposal which includes 35% wage increases over four years, a higher signing bonus of $7,000 and more.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Everyone’s watching Netflix shares
content: Many of us like to watch Netflix shows. But with the company’s dominance in the media and streaming industry, its stock, too, is worth watching.
summary: Many of us like to watch Netflix shows. But with the company’s dominance in the media and streaming industry, its stock, too, is worth watching.

title: Here's why inflation may look like it's easing but is still a huge problem
content: By nearly every barometer, inflation is still well above where most Americans, and in fact some Fed officials, feel comfortable.
summary: By nearly every barometer, inflation is still well above where most Americans, and in fact some Fed officials, feel comfortable.

title: Perplexity AI seeks valuation of about $9 billion in new funding round
content: Perplexity started the year with a roughly $500 million valuation and has continued attracting significant investor interest alongside the generative AI boom.
summary: Perplexity started the year with a roughly $500 million valuation and has continued attracting significant investor interest alongside the generative AI boom.

title: China needs stimulus with 'beautiful deleveraging' to avoid debt crisis, says Ray Dalio
content: China must employ a “beautiful deleveraging” in addition to its recent stimulus measures in order to avoid debt crisis, says Ray Dalio.
summary: China must employ a “beautiful deleveraging” in addition to its recent stimulus measures in order to avoid debt crisis, says Ray Dalio.

title: D.E. Shaw, Mantle Ridge zero in on key fixes to build shareholder value at Air Products
content: Both activists want to address CEO succession planning and capital allocation at the company.
summary: Both activists want to address CEO succession planning and capital allocation at the company.

title: Nvidia, Google, Microsoft and more head to Las Vegas to tout health-care AI tools
content: Tech companies are in Las Vegas this week to talk health-care AI at the HLTH conference.

title: Crypto's $130 million congressional election binge has candidates like Utah's John Curtis poised for big wins
content: In running to take Mitt Romney's Senate seat, Republican John Curtis has benefited by being a friend to the crypto industry.
summary: In running to take Mitt Romney's Senate seat, Republican John Curtis has benefited by being a friend to the crypto industry.

title: Netflix rose 11% after third-quarter earnings beat
content: Netflix saw momentum in its ad-supported membership tier, which surged 35% quarter over quarter.
summary: Netflix saw momentum in its ad-supported membership tier, which surged 35% quarter over quarter.

title: Stellantis to shutter and sell large testing facility amid cost-cutting efforts
content: Stellantis' Arizona Proving Grounds covers 4,000 acres between Phoenix and Las Vegas in Yucca, Arizona.
summary: Stellantis' Arizona Proving Grounds covers 4,000 acres between Phoenix and Las Vegas in Yucca, Arizona.

title: U.S. deficit tops $1.8 trillion in 2024 as interest on debt surpasses trillion-dollar mark
content: The shortfall was more than 8% from the previous year and the third highest on record, the Treasury Department said Friday.
summary: The shortfall was more than 8% from the previous year and the third highest on record, the Treasury Department said Friday.

title: Port of Los Angeles freight rail delays reach two-year high, with holiday and everyday items piling up
content: Record September imports at the Port of Los Angeles driven by the East Coast strike have led to two-year high cargo congestion at rail yards.
summary: Record September imports at the Port of Los Angeles driven by the East Coast strike have led to two-year high cargo congestion at rail yards.

title: After a well-received quarter, Cramer explains why he thinks Netflix can 'rock on higher'
content: NBC's Jim Cramer explained why the quarter made him more optimistic about Netflix's future.
summary: NBC's Jim Cramer explained why the quarter made him more optimistic about Netflix's future.

title: Procter & Gamble earnings beat estimates, but weak demand in China hurts sales
content: Procter & Gamble said volume fell in its Greater China market despite the earnings beat.
summary: Procter & Gamble said volume fell in its Greater China market despite the earnings beat.

title: Germany’s auto giants are struggling to stay relevant
content: Germany's automotive sector, long recognized for producing high-quality cars, is struggling to preserve its relevance in the age of electrification.
summary: Germany's automotive sector, long recognized for producing high-quality cars, is struggling to preserve its relevance in the age of electrification.

title: BlackRock's ETF chief says 75% of its bitcoin buyers are crypto fans new to Wall Street
content: Bitcoin ETF inflows surpass $2.1 billion in a week as bitcoin touches highest price level since July.

title: Spirit Airlines extends debt refinancing deadline hours before expiration
content: Spirit Airlines on Friday again extended a deadline with its credit card processor to renegotiate more than $1 billion in debt.
summary: Spirit Airlines on Friday again extended a deadline with its credit card processor to renegotiate more than $1 billion in debt.

title: Watch maker Patek Philippe launches first new collection in 25 years
content: The new collection comes at a time when luxury watch prices have largely stabilized, fueled by strong demand.
summary: The new collection comes at a time when luxury watch prices have largely stabilized, fueled by strong demand.

title: Amazon cloud boss says employees unhappy with 5-day office mandate can leave
content: Amazon's cloud boss on Thursday told employees who are unhappy with the company's new five-day in-office mandate they can leave for other companies.
summary: Amazon's cloud boss on Thursday told employees who are unhappy with the company's new five-day in-office mandate they can leave for other companies.

title: Tesla faces NHTSA investigation of ‘Full Self-Driving’ after fatal collision
content: Tesla faces a new U.S. probe concerning its "Full Self-Driving" systems, and whether they are safe to use in "reduced roadway visibility conditions."
summary: Tesla faces a new U.S. probe concerning its "Full Self-Driving" systems, and whether they are safe to use in "reduced roadway visibility conditions."

title: After rejecting Google takeover, cyber firm Wiz says it will IPO 'when the stars align'
content: Wiz is hoping to achieve $1 billion in annual recurring revenue in 2025 — a key condition the company wants to meet before going public.
summary: Wiz is hoping to achieve $1 billion in annual recurring revenue in 2025 — a key condition the company wants to meet before going public.
